column1: Show the status of the city that has hosted the greatest number of competitions.
column2: SELECT T1. every engineer's first name, last name, details and coresponding skill description.

column1: Please show the themes of competitions with host cities having populations larger than 1000.
column2: SELECT Country FROM mountain WHERE Height  >  5000

column1: Please show the different statuses of cities and the average population of cities with each status.
column2: SELECT Status ,  avg(Points) FROM player GROUP BY Status

column1: Please show the different statuses, ordered by the number of cities that have each.
column2: SELECT Country ,  COUNT(*) FROM member GROUP BY Country

column1: List the most common type of Status across cities.
column2: SELECT count(*) ,  city FROM employee GROUP BY city

column1: List the official names of cities that have not held any competition.
column2: SELECT Name FROM ship WHERE Ship_ID NOT IN (SELECT Ship_ID FROM mission)
